rukus.text: Besaka tuhada raba uha alaha hi hai, jisa ne asamanam ate dharati di racana 6 (che) dina vica kiti. Phira uha sighasana te baitha. Uha rata nu dina upara pa'unda hai, dina usa de piche daurada ho'i'a lagi'a a'unda hai. Usa ne paida kite suraja, cada ate tare. Sabha usa de hukama de agi'akari hana. Yada rakhom paida karana use da kama hai ate hukama karana vi. Uha vadi'am barakatam vala hai. Alaha sare sasara da palanahara hai
Apane raba nu giragira'unde ho'e holi hauli pukare. Besaka uha hada da ulaghana karana vali'am nu pasada nahim karada
Ate dharati upara vigara paida na karo usa de sudhara de ba'ada ate use nu dara ate umida de nala pukaro. Besaka alaha di kirapa cage kama karana vali'am de nere hai

Ate uha alaha hi hai, jihara havavam nu apani kirapa nala age khusakhbari bana ke bhejada hai ate jadom uha hava bhare badalam nu utha laindi hai, tam asim usa nu kise khusaka zamina vala haka dide ham phira asim usa rahim pani utarade ham, pani rahi' hareka prakara de fala maida karade ham. Isa tar'ham asim muradi'am nu vi kadhage tam ki tusim citana karo
Ate jihari zamina cagi hai. Usa vicom raba de hukama nala upaja haida hudi hai ate jihari zamina kharaba hai. Uthom upaja ghata paida hudi hai. Isa jihare sukara-guzara hude hana
